pages.text: $(tool)Tree Capitator$() (Tree Felling) chops down entire trees when you break the bottom log!$(br2)No more climbing or pillaring - fell the whole tree in one swing.

pages.title: Primary Material
pages.text: $(228B22)Oak Sapling$() grants $(tool)Tree Capitator +1$()$(br2)From small saplings, mighty lumber!

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: When you break a log with Tree Capitator:$(br2)1. The mod finds all connected logs$(br)2. The entire tree breaks at once$(br)3. Leaves decay naturally afterward$(br2)$(important)Uses durability$() for each log broken!

pages.title: Best Uses
pages.text: $(li)Quickly harvest lumber$(li)Clear forests efficiently$(li)Build without tree climbing$(li)Works on huge jungle trees!$(li)Compatible with modded trees$(br2)$(o)Lumberjack approved!$()
